LanguageData.AntitoxinKidney.label: antitoxin kidney
LanguageData.AntitoxinKidney.description: An advanced artificial antitoxin kidney. With lattice-dust healing system allows it to recover from damage and toxin filtering system allow it to filter toxin from blood. It is better than a biological kidney in almost every way. Requires special bionics research to install it.
LanguageData.MedicalLiver.label: medical liver
LanguageData.MedicalLiver.description: An advanced artificial medical liver. With lattice-dust healing system allows it to recover from damage and it can secreted more kind of immune system. It is better than a biological liver in almost every way. Requires special bionics research to install it.
LanguageData.EnergizedLiver.label: energized liver
LanguageData.EnergizedLiver.description: An advanced artificial energized liver. With lattice-dust healing system allows it to recover from damage and it can secreted special hormone that make user more energetic. It is better than a biological liver in almost every way. Requires special bionics research to install it.
LanguageData.MSE_PowerBlade.label: power blade
LanguageData.MSE_PowerBlade.description: An advanced artificial power blade. With its biogel nerve-link, lattice-dust healing system, and scyther blade attached to it, it is better than a biological shoulder in almost every way. Requires special bionics research to install it.
LanguageData.PowerArm.label: power arm
LanguageData.PowerArm.description: An advanced artificial power arm. With its biogel nerve-link, lattice-dust healing system, and high blunt damage than normal arm, it is better than a biological arm in almost every way. Requires special bionics research to install it.
LanguageData.BreathingSupportRib.label: breathing support rib
LanguageData.BreathingSupportRib.description: An advanced artificial breathing support rib. With lattice-dust healing system allows it to recover from damage and it can make user breath more ease. Requires special bionics research to install it.
LanguageData.RelaxationRib.label: relaxation rib
LanguageData.RelaxationRib.description: An advanced artificial relaxation rib. With lattice-dust healing system allows it to recover from damage and it can make user feel more relaxed. Requires special bionics research to install it.
LanguageData.ColdRegulatorRib.label: cold regulator rib
LanguageData.ColdRegulatorRib.description: An advanced artificial cold regulator rib. With lattice-dust healing system allows it to recover from damage and it can support blood to regulate cold temperature. Requires special bionics research to install it.
LanguageData.HeatRegulatorRib.label: heat regulator rib
LanguageData.HeatRegulatorRib.description: An advanced artificial heat regulator rib. With lattice-dust healing system allows it to recover from damage and it can support blood to regulate hot temperature. Requires special bionics research to install it.
